definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: To cultivate enabling relationship with Chinese authorities here and diaspora.
sentences.chinese: 培養中國當局與僑居者的親善關係。

sentences.english: After a successful career in business, he was appointed good-will ambassador .
sentences.chinese: 他在事業上取得成就之後就被任命爲親善大使。

sentences.english: Jim Gibbons is the head of Goodwill Industries International.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆吉本斯是產業的國際親善頭。

sentences.english: He is also China's goodwill ambassador, the most recognizable face of China overseas.
sentences.chinese: 他也是中國的親善大使，全世界最爲人熟知的中國人。

sentences.english: Japanese Prime Minister Naoto Kan is keen to build on that goodwill.
sentences.chinese: 日本首相菅直人藉機建立親善關係。

sentences.english: We would like you to become our PR volunteer and goodwill ambassador.
sentences.chinese: 要成爲園景軒的公關或親善大使嗎？

sentences.english: Jardine Ambassadors received a warm welcome from the students and teachers of Yingxiu Primary School.
sentences.chinese: 映秀小學的師生熱烈觀迎怡和親善大使的到訪。

sentences.english: However, the rapprochement has hardly been entirely one-sided.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這種親善不能只看一面。

sentences.english: As ambassadors of goodwill, you will be humble in victory and gracious in defeat.
sentences.chinese: 作爲親善大使，你們應勝不驕敗不餒。

sentences.english: We care about promoting peace and goodwill.
sentences.chinese: 我們關懷推廣和平及親善。

sentences.english: Jardine Ambassadors attend an orientation camp on Lantau Island.
sentences.chinese: 怡和親善大使參加在大嶼山舉行的夏日迎新營。

definition: the tone of a school/campus atmosphere
social movement/abbr. for 社會運動|社会运动
person in charge of a place that ends in 園|园, such as a vineyard 葡萄園|葡萄园, zoo 動物園|动物园, cemetery 陵園|陵园 etc
abbr. for 國際關係學院|国际关系学院[Guo2 ji4 Guan1 xi4 Xue2 yuan4], University of International Relations, Beijing
